OOC: I know the weapon limit is 5.  But I beg the council's understanding.  
Two of the weapons will be destroyed shortly.  And I still won't exceed the 
shot limit.

::Chaostaur::
       "Well, I've got these two lovely missile launchers.  Unfortunately 
they're rather slow and cumbersome."  He points to the shoulder mounted 
launchers.  "I also have two heavy blasters.  Also slow weapons.  They're 
strapped to my back along with two energy swords that I hate using.  What're 
you planning for me?"

--part1_82.d813f0f.288ee680_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
